title: Huge Bright Garden Apartment in Southport Corridor
posting_body: Beautiful, bright 3-bedroom garden apartment with high ceilings and hardwood floors throughout.
Large eat-in-kitchen, dishwasher, big closets, large windows, central heating/cooling/ceiling fans, coin-laundry in building, shared gated courtyard, and permit street parking.
Addison bus out front, Ashland bus 2 blocks away, Addison and Southport Brown line stops 4 blocks away, and Addison Red line 6 blocks away.
Jewel, CVS, Music Box Theater, Dunkin Donuts, Shell, and the entire Southport Corridor 2 blocks away.
It is a vibrant neighborhood that enjoys the boost of Wrigley Field nearby.
